segments.text: You should have seen the T . V . show that was on last night , the topic it covered was really interesting , animal rights .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you really believe in that ? If they are going to focus on something , they should do it on civil rights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but we can ’ t deny that animals are vulnerable , defenseless , and are completely at the mercy of human beings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand your point , but we continue to have transgressions against human rights . If so much attention weren ’ t devoted to the topic of animals , we would then concentrate more on saving a human being instead of protecting a koala .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can ’ t compare apples and oranges . I believe that both topics are important and that we can ’ t ignore them , the mistreatment of animals can cause a great environmental imbalance . I believe that governments should prohibit activities like poaching .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you are right on that point . This is the reason that I don ’ t buy leather and I try to buy synthetic products .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At least you ’ re doing your part . My contribution is to have a pet in the house that I treat like a member of the family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As long as you don ’ t treat it better than your wife , it ’ s fine .
segments.speaker: S2
